title: Academy Awards nominations in 2020 , by film
summary: Overall Number of nominations has constant over the Year.

Number of nominations is slightly increasing from Jojo_Rabbit to Joker, roughly constant from Joker to Marriage_Story, slightly increasing from Marriage_Story to Once_Upon_a_Time_in_Hollywood, and lastly slightly decreasing from Once_Upon_a_Time_in_Hollywood to Parasite.
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year Jojo_Rabbit to Joker.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year Jojo_Rabbit and Joker.
Maximum Number of nominations, about 11.0 was reported at Year Joker
The lowest Number of nominations, of value 6.0 was reported at Year Jojo_Rabbit,  Little_Women,  Marriage_Story, and Parasite
